identity.name: Cosmic Explorer Portfolio
principles: Emotion: The void of space creates focus; light creates hope
Motion: Everything floats; nothing is static
Immersion: The user is the astronaut

layout.structure: Single Page Application (SPA) feel within a standard HTML file

scene.camera: PerspectiveCamera with scroll-based movement along a CatmullRomCurve3 path

skill_orbs.behavior: Orbiting a central point or floating in a cluster

project_cards.type: HTML/CSS 3D Transforms or CSS3DRenderer mixed with WebGL
project_cards.alternative: Floating 3D Planes with project screenshots as textures

particles.behavior: Parallax movement based on mouse position

glass_panel.style: backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(5, 5, 5, 0.6); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 16px;
glass_panel.usage: Project cards, About info, Contact form

buttons.style: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #8b5cf6); color: white; border: none; padding: 12px 32px; border-radius: 99px; font-family: 'Orbitron'; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; transition: transform 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;

navigation.style: Fixed sidebar or top-right floating menu. Dots indicating scroll progress through the 'universe'.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. OVERWRITE index.html: Create a structure with a fixed canvas background and sections (Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Contact) that have 'min-height: 100vh'.
2. OVERWRITE style.css: Implement the 'Glass Panel' classes, typography, and ensure the body has 'margin: 0; overflow-x: hidden; background: #050505;'.

3. OVERWRITE script.js: Initialize Three.js scene. Create a starfield. Load the astronaut texture on a plane. Implement scroll-based camera movement (move camera z-axis or along a path based on window.scrollY).
4. PRESERVE CONTENT: Open the existing index.html (if any) or use the provided data (Mael Kahilu, 2 years exp, etc.) to populate the sections.
5. INTERACTION: Use GSAP (via CDN) to sync scroll position with Three.js camera movement. This is smoother than manual calculation.
6. MOBILE: Ensure the canvas resizes correctly and the text is readable on small screens (stack content, reduce 3D complexity if needed).
7. SKILLS: Create a group of meshes (cubes or spheres) that rotate slowly. Map the provided logo URLs as textures.
8. CONTACT: Simple HTML form styled with the Glass Panel look.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Ensure text contrast is high (White on Black).
Avoid generic Bootstrap layouts. Use CSS Grid/Flexbox with generous spacing.
Make it feel like a journey, not just a website.
